def _get_grouper(
    obj,
    key=None,
    axis=0,
    level=None,
    sort=True,
    observed=False,
    mutated=False,
    validate=True,
):
    # ... (existing code)

    if axis == 1:
        if key is None or isinstance(key, str):
            key = [key]

        keys = key
        match_axis_length = len(keys) == obj.shape[1]

        if match_axis_length:
            groupings = []
            exclusions = []

            for i, gpr in enumerate(keys):
                ping = (
                    Grouping(
                        obj.columns,
                        gpr,
                        obj=obj,
                        name=gpr,
                        level=level,
                        sort=sort,
                        observed=observed,
                        in_axis=True,
                    )
                )
                groupings.append(ping)
                exclusions.append(gpr)

            grouper = BaseGrouper(obj._get_axis(1), groupings, sort=sort, mutated=mutated)
            return grouper, exclusions, obj
        else:
            raise ValueError("Length of key and axis must be the same")
